resources.string: ScrollTrack needs permission to observe scrolling actions and app usage to help you understand your scrolling habits. No personal data is collected or shared without your explicit consent.
To track scroll distance and interaction events, the Accessibility Service must be enabled.
To measure phone usage time, this app requires access to your usage data.
To count notifications and provide content insights, this app needs access to read your notifications.
To calibrate, press "Begin", then scroll down exactly %1$.1fcm using a ruler against your screen. Press "Save" when done.
